subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Knicks Coach Larry Brown left the N.B.A. pre-draft camp in Orlando, Fla., after yesterday morning's session without publicly acknowledging the team president, Isiah Thomas, during his three-day stay.
snippet: Knicks Coach Larry Brown left the N.B.A. pre-draft camp in Orlando, Fla., after yesterday morning's session without publicly acknowledging the team president, Isiah Thomas, during his three-day stay.
